metadata.title: CVE-2019-12953 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Dropbear 2011.54 through 2018.76 has an inconsistent failure delay that maylead to revealing valid usernames, a different issue than CVE-2018-15599.

criterions.comment: dropbear: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
